vsParam:
Ah! N-nice to meet you.
I'm Ayesha Altugle.

When Bell and I were gathering herbs,
we were suddenly blinded by mist...

I saw a clear spring before figuring out what had happened.
And then Ru took me here...

Yeah, we chatted a bit and I found that she knows
a lot of herbs that I've never heard of.

I want to learn more about it, so I brought her back.
We can have a nice chat here.

Really? There are herbs even beyond Ru Sensei's ken.
Ah! Ayesha, maybe you come from another world?

Um... I don't know.
What happened?

You must've run into a "space-time distortion".
You may think of this place as another world.

After all, you know so many plants that I don't know.
Beyond that, I cannot think of any other explanation...

Haha...
Ru Sensei, that's how you got that conclusion...

Another world...
Hmm... It's a bit tricky.

I even got separated from Bell...
Although I think she'll be fine...

Bell? Oh, you mean that kid?
You have nothing to worry about, I think.

Oh, I found her! It's her. I was looking for her!
Come on, let go of me!!

No, you used the fire magic so rashly that you
burned yourself... We need to dress your wound first!

Ah, enough! The injury is no big deal!
Ayesha, come give me a hand!

It's... It's Bell!?
Great, Bell, you came here too!

Hmm, kind of... I didn't choose to come here.
Actually, I was taken here by force...

A giant woman, who's giant in every way, caught me
when I was busy killing monsters in the woods.

She offered to save me from monsters and
dress my injury... I can't get rid of her, so here I am...

Oh... Giant in every way, indeed... I know how it feels
when you can't escape however hard you try...

Haha... So, she is "Bell"?
The kid who got separated from Ayesha...

Yes, she is Bell!
A very capable witch.

Hey, Ayesha!?
That was supposed to be a secret!

Ayesha, oh my god...
Whatever, the secret is already out.

Ahem. I'm Wilbell Voll-Ersleid.
Don't tell people that I'm a witch, OK?!

Why? No need to keep it a secret here.
This is not your world.
Er, what? This is a different world?

Yeah. Witches and wizards are very common here.
The one "who's giant in every way" is a wizardry teacher.

R-really!? Wow...
It looks like we've come to a crazy world...

Hehe, right.
But I think we can go back to our world soon.

No, about that...
It'll take a while before you find a way to go back.

Er... Really? Hmm, what do I do?
I need to find my little sister...

Anyway, settle down here for now.
Maybe you'll find clues to your sister's whereabouts.

We have nowhere to go. Let's just settle here.
Nice to meet you!
Yeah! Nice to meet you, too. Ayesha, Wilbell!
